doc.db:para: The math:min function returns the minimum, for each node in the argument node-set, of the result of converting the string-values of the node to a number using the number function. The numbers are compared as with the < operator. If the node set is empty, NaN is returned.

template-doc.db:para: The math:min template returns a result tree fragment whose string value is the result of turning the number returned by the function into a string.
